alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Erath (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 4:22PM CDT until September 09 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Erath County in north central Texas... Central Comanche County in central Texas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 422 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over De Leon, or 12 miles west of Dublin, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Comanche, Dublin, De Leon, Proctor Lake, Comyn, Downing, Proctor, Van Dyke, Hasse, and Highland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning can kill.
